title: Hiruko Type Family
content:
Hi Guys,

Go easy on me here, as I admit I am a beginner. However, I have just spent around 300 hours and 8 weeks working on my first type family. It’s been absolutely pain staking work, but now it’s complete I think it’s worth it. Have and look and let me know if you like it, It’s been accepted by T26, but again I am a beginner learning a new craft, so please go easy on me :D

Had some problems uploading it, so I will have to link to it unfortunately,

[http://www.behance.net/Gallery/Hirukoa-Type-Family/125049](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819214510/http:/www.behance.net/Gallery/Hirukoa-Type-Family/125049 "http://www.behance.net/Gallery/Hirukoa-Type-Family/125049")

Thanks,  
Alex.
author: Thinkdust

comments.content:
Hi Alex. There's no doubt a VAG Rounded with Avant Garde Alt-ability will be well received by many designers. So, not a bad concept.

Your obliques could use a bit of [correction](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819214510/http:/www.marksimonson.com/article/128/).
